info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 1:36PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN FULTON... EASTERN SCHENECTADY...NORTHERN FULTON...MONTGOMERY...SOUTHERN SARATOGA...AND NORTHERN SARATOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 135 PM EST, an area of heavy snow was near Hagaman, or near Amsterdam moving east at 40 MPH. THIS AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Glenville, Galway and Pattersonville-Rotterdam Junction around 140 PM EST. Rock City Falls around 150 PM EST. Milton, Ballston Spa, North Ballston Spa and Burnt Hills around 155 PM EST. Clifton Park, Round Lake and Country Knolls around 200 PM EST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 27. Interstate 87 between exits 9 and 14. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
